rows.label: Plan Price (per month)
rows.description: The monthly cost of your subscription plan.

rows.label: Agents Included
rows.description: Number of agent licenses included in your plan at no extra cost.

rows.label: Additional Agents (per month)
rows.description: Add more seats to your plan and scale your team as needed.

rows.label: Customer Profiles
rows.description: Maximum number of unique customer profiles you can manage in your workspace.

rows.label: AI Usage
rows.description: Number of AI-powered actions (like summaries or replies) available per day.

rows.label: Billable Conversations Limit
rows.description: Monthly limit for human-handled conversations (if applicable).

rows.label: Free Trial
rows.description: Length and conditions of the free trial (e.g., days, credit card required or not).

rows.label: Chats Package
rows.description: Your plan includes a limited number of free chats. Each additional chat costs $0.03. Empty or unanswered chats don’t count — you won’t pay for them.

rows.label: Paid Chats
rows.description: Chats beyond the free plan.

rows.label: Alternative Payment Methods
rows.description: Pay via purchase orders or annual invoices instead of a company card.

rows.label: Pay With Crypto
rows.description: Pay with crypto like USDC on Ethereum, Solana, or Polygon.

rows.label: Monthly Subscription (per agent/month)
rows.description: The monthly cost charged for each agent seat on the selected plan.

rows.label: Annual Subscription (per agent/month)
rows.description: The equivalent monthly cost per agent when billed annually, usually offered at a discounted rate.

rows.label: Seats
rows.description: Number of agent seats included in the plan by default. May be 'Custom' for flexible or negotiated plans.

rows.label: Per agent/month billed annually
rows.description: Price per agent when billed annually.

rows.label: Per agent/month billed monthly
rows.description: Price per agent when billed monthly.

rows.label: Essential plan
rows.description: Represents the core subscription tier offering essential features for standard use.

rows.label: Advanced plan
rows.description: Indicates availability of the advanced subscription tier or add-on option.

rows.label: Cloud-based
rows.description: Your workspace data and conversations are securely hosted in the cloud, always accessible and backed up.

rows.label: Mobile Apps
rows.description: Access everything related to your customer service from your phone.

rows.label: Desktop Apps
rows.description: Use native apps on Windows and Mac for a seamless desktop experience.

rows.label: Real-time Notifications
rows.description: Receive alerts to stay up to date with open conversations.

rows.label: Developer APIs
rows.description: Access APIs to build custom integrations and automate workflows.

rows.label: Live Geolocation Map
rows.description: See all active website visitors in real time and start conversations.

rows.label: Conversation Transcript
rows.description: Easily export or view the full transcript of customer conversations.

rows.label: Conversation Triage
rows.description: Automatically sort and organize incoming conversations for efficient handling.

rows.label: Working Hours Settings
rows.description: Define business hours to set expectations and automate responses outside those times.

rows.label: Unlimited Conversations
rows.description: Handle as many customer conversations as you need, with no limits.

rows.label: Custom Email Domain
rows.description: Set up a custom domain to send outbound emails and improve deliverability.

rows.label: Full Conversations' history
rows.description: Access the full history of customer conversations for context and insights.

rows.label: Internal Notes
rows.description: Make internal collaboration easy, centralized, and tailored for each conversation.

rows.label: Visitor Banning
rows.description: Block users who exhibit inappropriate or abusive behavior on any channel.

rows.label: File Sharing
rows.description: Send and receive attachments directly within conversations.

rows.label: Canned Responses
rows.description: Create, manage, and use a gallery of prewritten messages to improve efficiency.

rows.label: Conversation Ratings
rows.description: Send automated surveys to measure customer satisfaction (CSAT).

rows.label: Follow-up Reminders
rows.description: Schedule predefined or custom reminders on each conversation with detailed notes.

rows.label: Round-robin Routing
rows.description: Assign conversations automatically to available agents in a fair, rotating manner.

rows.label: Customer Portal
rows.description: Offer a dedicated portal where customers can open new tickets or track existing ones.

rows.label: Internal Agent Chat
rows.description: Agents can chat internally without leaving the dashboard.

rows.label: Universal Inbox
rows.description: Centralized inbox to handle conversations from all channels.

rows.label: Hybrid Ticket Stream
rows.description: Single thread follows a customer across channels.

rows.label: Tags
rows.description: Tag conversations for search and reporting.

rows.label: Team Collaboration
rows.description: Invite your teammates and build chatbots together.

rows.label: All chats
rows.description: Total chats in a period.

rows.label: All messages
rows.description: Total messages received by your chatbot.

rows.label: Visitor notes
rows.description: Allows agents to add internal notes about a visitor or conversation for future reference.

rows.label: Chat widget
rows.description: Engage with people browsing your website and get closer to your customers.

rows.label: Contact Form
rows.description: Centralize submissions from customizable contact forms within the shared inbox.

rows.label: Email
rows.description: Receive and reply to team emails directly from the shared inbox.

rows.label: Telegram
rows.description: Receive and reply to Telegram messages from the shared inbox.

rows.label: Messenger
rows.description: Receive and reply to Facebook Messenger messages from the shared inbox.

rows.label: X (Twitter)
rows.description: Receive and reply to Twitter/X DMs from the shared inbox.

rows.label: Instagram
rows.description: Reply to Instagram Direct Messages and story replies from the dashboard.

rows.label: SMS
rows.description: Receive and reply to SMS messages in the shared inbox.

rows.label: Viber
rows.description: Receive and reply to Viber messages in the shared inbox.

rows.label: Phone
rows.description: Answer phone calls and trigger outbound calls directly from the platform.

rows.label: Line
rows.description: Receive and reply to Line messages in the shared inbox.

rows.label: WhatsApp Business
rows.description: Receive and reply to WhatsApp Business messages in the shared inbox.

rows.label: Active chatbots
rows.description: Maximum number of chatbots you can have active at the same time under this plan.

rows.label: Webflow
rows.description: Add ChatBot to your Webflow site.

rows.label: BigCommerce
rows.description: Connect your ChatBot to BigCommerce.

rows.label: Live Chat
rows.description: Enables real-time text conversations between website visitors and support agents through an embedded chat window.

rows.label: Live Video Calls
rows.description: Supports direct video communication between agents and customers for instant, face-to-face interaction.

rows.label: App integrations
rows.description: Supports integration with third-party apps to extend platform functionality and workflows.

rows.label: Support over email
rows.description: Provides customer support via email communication.

rows.label: Support over live chat
rows.description: Provides customer support through real-time live chat assistance.

rows.label: Email ticketing – Incoming email accounts
rows.description: Number of incoming email addresses that can be connected for ticket creation.

rows.label: Email ticketing – Outgoing email accounts
rows.description: Number of outgoing email accounts that can be used to send replies from the system.

rows.label: Call center
rows.description: Includes built-in call center functionality for handling voice calls.

rows.label: Messenger + Instagram
rows.description: Supports Instagram messaging when the Messenger channel is connected.

rows.label: WhatsApp
rows.description: Supports WhatsApp as a communication channel.

rows.label: Video call functionality
rows.description: Allows conducting real-time video calls with customers.

rows.label: Call Queueing
rows.description: Places callers in a waiting queue when all agents are busy.

rows.label: IVR
rows.description: Interactive voice response menu for routing callers through predefined options.

rows.label: In call recordings
rows.description: Allows recording phone calls for review or quality assurance.

rows.label: Call routing & transfers
rows.description: Allows redirecting and transferring calls between agents or departments.

rows.label: Hardware IP phone
rows.description: Allows using physical IP phones integrated with the call center system.

rows.label: Email with unlimited addresses
rows.description: Provides unlimited email addresses for handling incoming and outgoing messages.

rows.label: Contact form
rows.description: Enables a built-in contact form for collecting customer inquiries.

rows.label: WordPress
rows.description: Easily install the chat widget on your WordPress site.

rows.label: Shopify
rows.description: Sync e-commerce data with your inbox to enable dedicated features.

rows.label: WooCommerce
rows.description: Sync WooCommerce orders and customer data for better support.

rows.label: Adobe Commerce
rows.description: Integrate with Adobe Commerce to centralize customer communications.

rows.label: Prestashop
rows.description: Integrate with Prestashop to sync orders and customer data.

rows.label: Slack

rows.label: HubSpot

rows.description: Synchronize with your Pipedrive account.

rows.label: Zoho CRM

rows.label: Segment
rows.description: Connect as a source and collect customer data from hundreds of platforms.

rows.label: Zapier

rows.label: Make

rows.label: n8n

rows.label: Salesforce

rows.description: Connect your ChatBot to Squarespace.

rows.label: Custom
rows.description: Create custom integrations with your tools and services.

rows.label: Webhooks
rows.description: Exchange data between your backend and chatbot to customize flows.

rows.label: Javascript API
rows.description: Control Chat Widget behavior on your website with JavaScript.

rows.label: REST API
rows.description: Manage chatbot data and actions through secure HTTP requests.

rows.label: Native Shopify actions

rows.label: OpenAPI

rows.label: Slack notifications
rows.description: Sends notifications to Slack based on new conversations or updates.

rows.label: API keys
rows.description: Allows generating API keys for connecting external systems or automations.

rows.label: Integrations
rows.description: Supports connecting external systems and services directly with the platform.

rows.label: Chat SDKs

rows.label: Live Typing preview
rows.description: See what users are typing before they hit send.

rows.label: Typing Status Indicator
rows.description: See when a user or agent is typing in real time.

rows.label: Widget Customization
rows.description: Customize colors, text, and position to match your brand.

rows.label: Proactive Chat Messages

rows.label: MagicBrowse
rows.description: Start a co-browsing session with website visitors and share your screen if needed.

rows.label: LiveTranslate
rows.description: Translate messages instantly in 50+ languages.

rows.label: Video & Audio chat
rows.description: Engage with leads or customers through live audio or video.

rows.label: Help Widget
rows.description: Add a self-service help widget to your site for instant answers.

rows.label: White Label
rows.description: Remove vendor branding from the widget.

rows.label: Chat Window Docking
rows.description: Users can dock the chat window while browsing; notifications show on new messages.

rows.label: Max Queue Auto-hide/Auto-offline
rows.description: Hide or switch widget offline automatically when queue length exceeds a limit.

rows.label: Multilingual Chat Widget
rows.description: Offer the chat widget in 40+ languages; configure per-widget language options.

rows.label: Version History
rows.description: Access ten last versions of your chatbots and restore previous ones if needed.

rows.label: LiveChat
rows.description: Connect LiveChat to combine AI efficiency with human support.

rows.label: Chat page
rows.description: Provides a dedicated webpage where customers can start a chat outside the main site widget.

rows.description: Removes default platform branding from the chat widget. May require an add-on or higher-tier plan.

rows.label: Custom branding

rows.label: Contact forms – Contact us buttons
rows.description: Number of 'Contact us' buttons or contact form entry points that can be added.

rows.description: Number of embedded in-page contact forms supported under this plan.

rows.label: Live chat button
rows.description: Number of live chat button placements supported under this plan.

rows.label: Proactive chat invitations
rows.description: Allows triggering chat invitations to visitors based on behavior or conditions.

rows.label: Feedback buttons
rows.description: Adds feedback buttons to collect customer ratings or reactions.

rows.label: Chat transcripts
rows.description: Allows downloading or viewing transcripts of chat conversations.

rows.label: File sharing over chat
rows.description: Allows sending and receiving files directly in the chat window.

rows.label: Mobile chat window
rows.description: Optimized chat widget experience for mobile devices.

rows.label: Chat welcome message setting
rows.description: Allows setting a custom welcome message that appears when a chat starts.

rows.label: Chat satisfaction surveys
rows.description: Sends post-chat rating prompts to collect customer satisfaction feedback.

rows.label: Contact form widgets customization
rows.description: Allows customizing the appearance and behavior of contact form widgets.

rows.label: Chat widgets customization
rows.description: Allows customizing design and layout of chat widgets to match brand style.

rows.label: Sound configuration
rows.description: Allows configuring notification and chat sound settings.

rows.label: Call widgets customization
rows.description: Allows customizing the appearance and layout of call widgets.

rows.label: Multiple language support
rows.description: Allows using the platform interface and communication tools in multiple languages.

rows.label: Multiple website support
rows.description: Allows using the chat or help center across multiple websites or domains.

rows.label: Multibrand support
rows.description: Supports managing multiple brands with separate configurations or appearance settings.

rows.description: Ingest your internal data to train a custom AI knowledge base or model.

rows.description: Get immediate transcription for audio messages or recorded calls.

rows.label: Multilingual AIb

rows.label: AI Agent conversations
rows.description: Number of conversations handled by the AI agent included in the plan. Some plans include a free lifetime quota (e.g., first 50 conversations), with higher limits or custom options available on paid tiers.

rows.label: Lyro tasks
rows.description: AI agent task automation feature that allows Lyro to handle customer requests or actions automatically within the plan.

rows.description: Provides AI-based product recommendations available with a paid AI agent quota or on higher-tier plans.

rows.label: AI reply assistant

rows.label: AI Chatbot

rows.description: Maximum allowed size for file attachments in tickets, such as 50MB.
